code: import _classCallCheck from"C:\\Users\\HSONNL\\Desktop\\myProject\\NCOV-19\\Repo\\NCOV-19Manager\\client\\node_modules\\babel-preset-react-app\\node_modules\\@babel\\runtime/helpers/esm/classCallCheck";import axios from"axios";var USER_SIGNIN="/api/user/login";var UPLOAD_AVT="/api/user/upload-avatars";var GET_PROFILE="/api/user/";var USER_CHANGEPASSWORD="/api/user/change-password";var UserAPI=function UserAPI(){_classCallCheck(this,UserAPI);this.uploadAvatar=function(token,formData,response,error){axios.post(UPLOAD_AVT,formData,{headers:{Authorization:token}}).then(response).catch(error);};this.userLogin=function(formData,response,error){var data={"identityCard":formData.get("identityCard"),"password":formData.get("password")};axios.post(USER_SIGNIN,data).then(response).catch(error);};this.getProfile=function(token,response,error){axios.get(GET_PROFILE,{headers:{Authorization:token}}).then(response).catch(error);};this.changePassword=function(token,formData,response,error){var data={"newPassword":formData.get("newPassword"),"againNewPassword":formData.get("againNewPassword")};axios.put(USER_CHANGEPASSWORD,data,{headers:{Authorization:token}}).then(response).catch(error);};};export{UserAPI as default};
